name: Long Spring Wastes
description:
After the 'Watchtower 33' incident, some 'Redmark' mercenaries avoided Rhodes Island's pursuit while controlling the remnant Originiutant mutants. If these organisms are allowed to escape to other areas, the outcome would be disastrous. Please carry out a thorough extermination.
<@lv.rem><Special Conditions></> DP will not regenerate naturally
<@lv.item><Sandstorm></> Allied units caught inside the sandstorm will have reduced ATK, continuously take damage over time, and have extended redeployment time; Enemy units will instead be slowed
